name: en-osm-omt_south_asia
title: OpenStreetMap: South Asia & Earth
description:
19 levels of zoom (~1 m details) for South Asia, illustrating human geography.

10 levels of zoom (~1 km details) for satellite photos, covering the whole world.
extra_description: Search for cities/towns with more than 1000 people.  There are about 127,654 worldwide.
